title: Fushigi no Kuni no Alice (Alice in Wonderland)
synopsis: A retelling of Lewis Carroll's classic tale of the young girl Alice, who follows a white rabbit into a hole, only to find herself in Wonderland, where she meets many interesting characters, both the mysterious Cheshire Cat and the terrible Queen of Hearts.
characters: ['Benny Bunny', 'Alice', 'Queen of Hearts', 'Mock Turtle', 'Celia', 'Caterpillar', "Duchess's Maid", 'Humpty Dumpty', 'Dormouse', 'Eaglet']
staff: [['Koshi, Shigeo', ['Director', ' Series Production Director', ' Production Manager']], ["D'Avena, Cristina", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Carroll, Lewis', ['Original Creator']], ['Mori, Yasuji', ['Layout']]]
